item.tradewinds.traders_manual.landing_t: Welcome to $(bold)Tradewinds$(), a mod about market economics and long-distance trade.$(p)Travel between villages, buy and sell goods, and become a filthy rich merchant prince!$(p)Click a category on the right to get started.
